page.title: 11Leisure in N.W.Guildford 1
page.content: My name is Vicky and I am twelve years old. I enjoy attending dancing lessons and playing outside with my friends. But I especially enjoy visiting the theatre and reading. My five year old brother enjoys playing with his friends, his toy cars, or listening to records, tapes or stories. He also loves outdoor activities like swimming or tennis. My Dad enjoys playing Bridge, working on his car, reading and taking the dog for a walk to the pub. Mum enjoys an undisturbed read when all her house work is done, or visiting the theatre. As a family we enjoy walks in the countryside with our dog, or playing swingball in our garden. We also enjoy visiting our relatives and just being together, especially at Christmas and holiday times.
